H0.text: What number has the square root (to the nearest four decimal places) of 1.4142? 1; 2; 3; or 4. 1.41

H1.text: What number has the square root (to the nearest four decimal places) of 1.4142? 1; 2; 3; or 4. 1

H2.text: What number has the square root (to the nearest four decimal places) of 1.4142? 1; 2; 3; or 4. 3

H3.text: What number has the square root (to the nearest four decimal places) of 1.4142? 1; 2; 3; or 4. 2

A4.text: The square root of 2 (approximately 1.4142) is the positive real number that, when multiplied by itself or squared, equals the number 2.
